marklogic.body:
Orton will win because he Always wins. I really think Cody Rhodes is going to win, everything is going right for him and he needs to keep the momentum. It's also nice to have an IC match with an actual storyline behind it. Team Johnny vs Team Teddy is a toss up, the only thing I know is that Ziggler will be the last person on team Johnny.
The divas match will have just one incredible Spot, and that would be when I go into the kitchen to make a sandwich.
